text: The 1988 Santa Clara Broncos football team represented Santa Clara University during the 1988 NCAA Division II football season. Santa Clara competed in the Western Football Conference (WFC). The Broncos were led by fourth-year head coach Terry Malley. They played home games at Buck Shaw Stadium in Santa Clara, California. Santa Clara finished the season with a record of seven wins and four losses (7–4, 4–2 WFC). The Broncos outscored their opponents 251–233 for the season. ==Schedule== ==Team players in the NFL== No Santa Clara Broncos players were selected in the 1989 NFL Draft. ==Notes== ==References== Santa Clara Broncos Category:Santa Clara Broncos football seasons Santa Clara Broncos f
title: 1988 Santa Clara Broncos football team
